verses.content: Chuongchun, Samuel chun hriek bâwm chu a hung lâk suok a, a lua chun a bur a, a fâwp a, “LALPA chun a rochan hai chunga hotu dingin hriek a nâl che a ni naw am a nih? LALPA mipuihai chungah ro rêl i ta, an vêla an hmêlmahai kuta inthawkin sandam i tih. Chun, hi hi LALPAIN a rochanhai chunga hotu dingin a ruot che ti inchikna chu ning a tih.

Vawisûn hin i mi fesan hnungin, Zelzaah Benjamin ramria Rakil thlân kâwlah mi pahni hmûng i ta; chun, anni chun i kuomah, Sabengtung i zawnghai kha an hmu tah ie; chun, ngai ta, i pa chun sabengtung chu a ngaituo ta nawh a, nangma mawl a ngaituoh a, ‘Ka naupa chu iengtin am ka thaw ding a ni ta leh aw, a ti a ti el a,’ tîng an ta.

Chun, chutaka inthawk chun fe pei la, Tabor thingsaisuo chu va tlung i ta, chutaka chun mi pathum, Bethela Pathien kuoma hang fe dinghaiin lo intuokpui an ti cheh a; pakhat chun kêlte pathum pawm a ta, pakhat chun beiphêk pathum chawi a ta, chun, pakhat chun uoin peng chawi bawk a tih.
Chun, chibai bûk an ti cheh a, beiphêk chu phêk hni pêng an ti cheh a; chu chu lâng i ta.

Chu hnunga chun Philistin sipai- hai umna Pathien tlâng chu va tlung i ta, chun, chutaka khuo i va tlung chun zâwlneihai perkhuong dâm, khuongtê dâm, theihle dâm, ṭingṭang dâm chawihai hma ṭhuoia bâwl- hmuna inthawka hung thla intuok- pui i ta; chun, thu hril duol duol an ta;
chun, LALPA thlarau nasatakin i chungah hung tlung a ta, nang khawm thu an hril duol duolnaa chun ṭhang vêng i ta, chun, mi danglam daiah inchang el i tih.
Chun, hieng inchiknahai hi i chunga a hung um pha chun thil hung umin a zir ang peiin i thaw ding a nih; Pathien chu i kuomah a um pei sih a.

Chun, ka fe hma hin Gilgala chun lo zu fe la, chun, ngai ta, kei khawm pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai le in- remna inthâwinahai inhlân dingin i kuomah hung thlâng ka ta; i kuoma ka hung a, i thaw ding ka hung hril hma che chun ni sari i lo um ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Samuel chu ṭhe dinga a hnungnghat phingleh Pathien chun lungril danglam dai a pêk tah a; chun, chuong inchiknahai po po chu chu ni chun a hung tlung ta vawng a.
Chuongchun, tlâng chu an hang tlung chun, ngai ta, zâwlneihai chun an intuokpui a; chun LALPA thlarau nasatakin a hung tlung a; thu an hril duol duolnaa chun a ṭhang ve tah a.

Chun, kha hmaa ama lo hre hlakhaiin zâwlneihai thu hril duol duolnaah a ṭhang ve ti an hriet chun mihai chu an inbiek a, “Kis naupa chunga thil hung um hi ieng am a ni ta leh? Saula khawm chu zâwlneihai lai a ṭhang ve am a ni el tah?” an ta.
Chun, a umna khuoa mi pakhatin a dawn a, “An pa chu tu am a ni bîk leh?” an ta. Chuongchun, “Saula khawm chu zâwlnei a ni ve el ta a ni maw chu?” ti chu ṭawngna takah an hmang ta zing a.
Chun, an thu hril duol duolnaa a ṭhang zo chun bâwlhmun chu a tlung tah a.
Chun, Saula pami chun a kuoma le a siehlaw kuoma chun, “Khâwlai am in feh a?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Sabengtung kan zawng a nih, chun, kan hmu zo naw phingleh Samuel kuomah kan fe a nih,” a ta.
Saula pami chun, “Samuel chun i kuomah ieng am a na a hril mi hril raw khai,” a ta.
Saula chun a pami kuoma chun, “Sabengtunghai chu an hmu tah ti a mi hril ngei kha tie,” a ta. Amiruok- chu, ram chungchâng thu Samuelin a hril chu a hril nawh a.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun mi- puihai chu Mizpaa chun LALPA kuomah a ko khâwm a;

Israel thlahai kuoma chun, “LALPA Israelhai Pathien chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih, ‘Israelhai chu Aiguptaa inthawkin ka ṭhuoi suok a, Aigupta mihai kuta inthawk le, a hnuoisietuhai cheu ram po poa in- thawkin ka sansuok cheu a.

Nisienlakhawm, vawisûn hin in lunginzîngna po po le in rinumna po poa sanhimtu cheu in Pathien ngei chu in dit nawh a, a kuomah, A ni nawh, lal mi siempêk rawh’ in tih a. Chuleiin, tuhin a hnama hnam le a chia chiin LALPA hmaah hung inlang ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun Israel chi po po chu a hung inlangtir a, chun, Benjamin chi chu thlang a lo ni tah a.

Chun, Benjamin chihai chu a sûngkuoin a hung inlangtir a, Matri mi sûngkuo chu thlang an lo ni tah a; chun, Kis naupa Saula chu thlang a lo ni tah a, nisienlakhawm, ama chu an hang zawng a, an hmu nawh a.
Chuongchun, LALPA chu an hang indawn nâwk a, “Mi dang la hung ding an um am?” an ta. Chun, LALPA chun a dawn a, “Ngai ta u, thuomhnaw lai ân bihmang a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an tlân a, an va ṭhuoi suok a; chun, mipui lai a hang ngîr chun mi lai chun ân sâng tak el a, mi dang hrim hrim a liengko nêka insâng khawm an um nawh a.
Chun, Samuel chun mi po po kuomah, “LALPA mi ruot hi in hmu am? Mipuihai po po lai ama ang hrim hrim an um nawh,” a ta. Chun, mipuihai chu an khêk a, “Pathienin laltak chu humhim raw se,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun mi- puihai chu ram umdân ding chu a hril a, lekhabuah a ziek a, LALPA hmaa chun a sieh a. Chun, Samuel chun mipuihai chu mâni in tieng seng ân ṭintir tah a.
Saula khawm chu Gibea khuoha a in tieng a fe tah a; mi huoisenhai, an lungril Pathienin a tâwkhai, chu a kuomah an fe veh a.

Amiruokchu, Belial nauhai tu- haiin amani ruok chun, “Hi mipa hin iengtin am mi sandam thei hlak a ta?” an ta. Chuongchun, ama chu an ngainêp a, thilpêk hrim hrim an pêk nuom nawh a. Nisienlakhawm, ama chu a to zing a.
